title: How to Get Robux for Your Roblox Account

steps.headline: Open the Roblox website.
steps.description: Go to https://www.roblox.com/home in your browser. If you're logged into Roblox, doing so will open the Home page. If you aren't logged into Roblox, enter your username and password in the upper-left side of the page, then click Sign In.

steps.headline: Click ☰.
steps.description: It's in the top-left corner of the window. A pop-up menu will appear.

steps.headline: Click Upgrade Now.
steps.description: This blue button is near the bottom of the pop-out menu. Clicking it takes you to the account upgrade page.

steps.headline: Select an upgrade tier.
steps.description:
Depending on how many daily Robux you want to receive, click either the Monthly or the Annually button below one of the following categories:

Classic - Receive 15 Robux per day. Turbo - Receive 35 Robux per day. Outrageous - Receive 60 Robux per day.

steps.headline: Select a payment method.
steps.description:
On the right side of the page, check the bubble to the left of one of the following options:

Credit - Pay with a credit card. Debit - Pay with a debit card. Paypal - Use Paypal to pay. Roblox card - Use a gift card's balance. Rixty - Pay with Rixty online currency.

steps.headline: Click Continue.
steps.description: It's a sage-colored button below the column of payment methods. You can also check an additional amount of Robux to add on the left side of the page before continuing.

steps.headline: Enter your payment details.
steps.description: This will usually entail entering your card number, expiration date, and holder name for a credit or debit card, though Paypal and Rixty users will instead just sign into their respective accounts to verify the amount. If you're using a Roblox card, you'll just need to enter the card's number.

steps.headline: Click Submit Order.
steps.description:
This green button is on the right side of the page. Doing so will purchase your selected rendition of the Builder's Club package, which will add the appropriate number of Robux to your daily balance. Tip: If you want to cancel your membership at any time, you can click the Settings gear {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/d\/d0\/Windowssettings.png","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/d\/d0\/Windowssettings.png","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":445,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":735.483870967742,"licensing":"

steps.headline: Open the Roblox website.
steps.description: Go to https://www.roblox.com/home in your browser. If you're logged into Roblox, doing so will open the Home page. If you aren't logged into Roblox, enter your username and password in the upper-left side of the page, then click Sign In.

steps.headline: Click the Robux tab.
steps.description: It's at the top of the Roblox page, just left of the search bar.

steps.headline: Find a number of Robux to buy.
steps.description: On the left side of the page, you'll see different numbers of Robux listed. Tip: If you're a Builder's Club member, you'll receive more Robux per price tier than if you just buy them independently.

steps.headline: Click Buy for.
steps.description: You'll find this green button to the right of your selected number of Robux, along with the price. For example, if you're buying 400 Robux for $4.95, you'll click Buy for $4.95 here.

steps.headline: Select a payment method.
steps.description:
On the right side of the page, check the bubble to the left of one of the following options:

Credit - Pay with a credit card. Debit - Pay with a debit card. PayPal - Use Paypal to pay. Roblox card - Use a gift card's balance. Rixty - Pay with Rixty online currency.

steps.headline: Click Continue.
steps.description: It's below the column of payment methods.

steps.headline: Enter your payment details.
steps.description: This will usually entail entering your card number, expiration date, and holder name for a credit or debit card, though PayPal and Rixty users will instead just sign into their respective accounts to verify the amount. If you're using a Roblox card, you'll just need to enter the card's number.

steps.headline: Click Submit Order.
steps.description: It's a green button on the right side of the page. Doing so adds the selected number of Robux to your profile.

steps.headline: Make sure that you're a Builder's Club member.
steps.description: In order to create and upload items for sale on the Roblox marketplace, you must be at least a tier-1 Builder's Club member.

steps.headline: Make sure that you have something to sell.
steps.description: For example, you can create a custom shirt (or a set of pants) and then upload it to your profile; once you've done this, you're able to sell as you please.

steps.headline: Open the Roblox website.
steps.description: Go to https://www.roblox.com/home in your browser. If you're logged into Roblox, doing so will open the Home page. If you aren't logged into Roblox, enter your username and password in the upper-left side of the page, then click Sign In.

steps.headline: Click the Develop tab.
steps.description: It's at the top of the page.

steps.headline: Select an item category.
steps.description: Click an item type (e.g., Shirts) below the "My Creations" heading. Tip: If you don't see item categories, click the My Creations tab near the top of the page first.

steps.headline: Find the item that you want to sell.
steps.description: If you have many items in your selected category, scroll down until you find the one that you want to sell.

steps.headline:
Click the Settings gear {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/6\/68\/Android7settings.png","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/6\/68\/Android7settings.png","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":460,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":760,"licensing":"

I edited this screenshot of an Android icon.\n<\/p>

\n<\/p><\/div>"}.
steps.description: It's to the right of the item. A drop-down menu will appear.

steps.headline: Click Configure.
steps.description: This option is at the top of the drop-down menu. Doing so opens the item's page.

steps.headline: Scroll down and set a Robux price.
steps.description: In the "Price" text field below the "Sell this Item" heading, type in the amount of Robux for which you want to sell the item. If this field is greyed out, you'll first need to check the "Sell this item" box directly below the "Sell this Item" heading. Roblox takes a 30 percent cut of anything you sell.

steps.headline: Click Save.
steps.description: This will save your changes and make your item available for sale. Whenever someone purchases your item, you'll receive 70 percent of whatever they paid.

text:
Using Your Builder's Club Membership Open the Roblox website. Go to https://www.roblox.com/home in your browser. If you're logged into Roblox, doing so will open the Home page. If you aren't logged into Roblox, enter your username and password in the upper-left side of the page, then click Sign In. Click ☰. It's in the top-left corner of the window. A pop-up menu will appear. Click Upgrade Now. This blue button is near the bottom of the pop-out menu. Clicking it takes you to the account upgrade page. Select an upgrade tier. Depending on how many daily Robux you want to receive, click either the Monthly or the Annually button below one of the following categories: Classic - Receive 15 Robux per day. Turbo - Receive 35 Robux per day. Outrageous - Receive 60 Robux per day. Select a payment method. On the right side of the page, check the bubble to the left of one of the following options: Credit - Pay with a credit card. Debit - Pay with a debit card. Paypal - Use Paypal to pay. Roblox card - Use a gift card's balance. Rixty - Pay with Rixty online currency. Click Continue. It's a sage-colored button below the column of payment methods. You can also check an additional amount of Robux to add on the left side of the page before continuing. Enter your payment details. This will usually entail entering your card number, expiration date, and holder name for a credit or debit card, though Paypal and Rixty users will instead just sign into their respective accounts to verify the amount. If you're using a Roblox card, you'll just need to enter the card's number. Click Submit Order. This green button is on the right side of the page. Doing so will purchase your selected rendition of the Builder's Club package, which will add the appropriate number of Robux to your daily balance. Tip: If you want to cancel your membership at any time, you can click the Settings gear {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/d\/d0\/Windowssettings.png","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/d\/d0\/Windowssettings.png","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":445,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":735.483870967742,"licensing":"

If you're logged into Roblox, doing so will open the Home page. If you aren't logged into Roblox, enter your username and password in the upper-left side of the page, then click Sign In. Click the Robux tab. It's at the top of the Roblox page, just left of the search bar. Find a number of Robux to buy. On the left side of the page, you'll see different numbers of Robux listed. Tip: If you're a Builder's Club member, you'll receive more Robux per price tier than if you just buy them independently. Click Buy for. You'll find this green button to the right of your selected number of Robux, along with the price. For example, if you're buying 400 Robux for $4.95, you'll click Buy for $4.95 here. Select a payment method. On the right side of the page, check the bubble to the left of one of the following options: Credit - Pay with a credit card. Debit - Pay with a debit card. PayPal - Use Paypal to pay. Roblox card - Use a gift card's balance. Rixty - Pay with Rixty online currency. Click Continue. It's below the column of payment methods. Enter your payment details. This will usually entail entering your card number, expiration date, and holder name for a credit or debit card, though PayPal and Rixty users will instead just sign into their respective accounts to verify the amount. If you're using a Roblox card, you'll just need to enter the card's number. Click Submit Order. It's a green button on the right side of the page. Doing so adds the selected number of Robux to your profile. Selling Items Make sure that you're a Builder's Club member. In order to create and upload items for sale on the Roblox marketplace, you must be at least a tier-1 Builder's Club member. Make sure that you have something to sell. For example, you can create a custom shirt (or a set of pants) and then upload it to your profile; once you've done this, you're able to sell as you please. Open the Roblox website. Go to https://www.roblox.com/home in your browser. If you're logged into Roblox, doing so will open the Home page. If you aren't logged into Roblox, enter your username and password in the upper-left side of the page, then click Sign In. Click the Develop tab. It's at the top of the page. Select an item category. Click an item type (e.g., Shirts) below the "My Creations" heading. Tip: If you don't see item categories, click the My Creations tab near the top of the page first. Find the item that you want to sell. If you have many items in your selected category, scroll down until you find the one that you want to sell. Click the Settings gear {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/6\/68\/Android7settings.png","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/6\/68\/Android7settings.png","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":460,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":760,"licensing":"

\n<\/p><\/div>"}. It's to the right of the item. A drop-down menu will appear. Click Configure. This option is at the top of the drop-down menu. Doing so opens the item's page. Scroll down and set a Robux price. In the "Price" text field below the "Sell this Item" heading, type in the amount of Robux for which you want to sell the item. If this field is greyed out, you'll first need to check the "Sell this item" box directly below the "Sell this Item" heading. Roblox takes a 30 percent cut of anything you sell. Click Save. This will save your changes and make your item available for sale. Whenever someone purchases your item, you'll receive 70 percent of whatever they paid.
